  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()

    • builderAndGetter

      public void builderAndGetter()
      This test check that:

      - Builder works fine, creating correctly the Lobbyplayers passed as parameter.

      - Getter works fine.

      - Variables are correctly initialized.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      This test check that:

      - Method nextLobbyPlayer pass turn to the next player.

    • updateChosenDeck

      public void updateChosenDeck()
      This test check:

      - Method updateChosenDeck

      - Method getChosenDeck

      This test if focused on Insert and Remove Cards from deck.

      It tries to add and remove cards and then check with the getter if the deck has been updated.

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor()
      This test mainly check:

      - Method chooseColor

      - Method getAvailableColors

      - Method getStateOfTurn

      This test if focused on Player's choose of color.

      It tries to simulate the phase of color's choose in the lobby. It checks that list of available colors is correctly updated. Moreover it checks that after every player has choose his color the Lobby's StateOfTurn pass to StateOfTurn.CARD.

    • chooseCard

      public void chooseCard()
      This test mainly check:

      - Method chooseCard

      - Method isDeckChosen

      - Method getStateOfTurn

      This test if focused on Player's choose of card.

      It tries to simulate the phase of cards's choose in the lobby. It checks that list of available cards is correctly updated. Moreover it checks that after every player has choose his card the Lobby's StateOfTurn pass to StateOfTurn.CHOOSESTARTPLAYER.

    • chooseStartPlayer

      public void chooseStartPlayer()
      This test check:

      - Method chooseStartPlayer

      - Method getPlayingNow

      This test if focused on Master Player choose of starting player.

      Check that player's chosen by the Master is the one who is marked as playing now.
